text: Ej Pajomʙar, hargiz dar on mascid namoz maguzor. Mascide, ki az ruzi naxust ʙar parhezgori ʙunjod sud va on (mascidi Rasuli Alloh) soistatar ast, ki dar on co namoz guzori. Dar on co mardone hastand, ki dust dorand az nacosathovu palidiho va az gunohhovu ma'sijatho pokiza ʙosand, zero Alloh pokizagonro dust dorad
